item.title: 'lzma_nothrow' and MSVC
item.description:
I was reading through "src\liblzma\api\lzma.h", and I found something there.
It's checking the value of __cplusplus and comparing with a number. However, MSVC is assigning __cplusplus to 197711, suggesting that it is stuck in 1998.
So MSVC requires a separate language version check. _MSC_VER >= 1900 will check against Visual C++ 2015, which was the first release to support noexcept.
item.dc:creator: Dan Weiss
